name: Astro Panic
description:
Astro Panic is a shoot'em up similar to Space Invaders except there are less enemies and they move around the screen individually.

On each level there are 6 space ships and the player must shoot them all. The enemy ships move around in straight lines and bounce on the edges of the screen, similar to the balls in Arkanoid. The ships do not shoot back at the player, but when an enemy ship collides with the player's cannon at the bottom of the screen one life is lost. When all cannons are lost the game is over. After each level the same enemy 6 ships re-appear and the player has to shoot them all again, but each time the speed of the enemy ships increases.

shot.caption: The enemy ships appear on one line but quickly start moving around
Down to the last 3 enemies in this level
Each level is the same, except the enemy ships move faster
